Uses of Class
utils.Base

Packages that use Base
Package
Description
boundary
 
controller
 

  • Uses of Base in boundary

    Subclasses of Base in boundary
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    class 
    BaseBoundary
    The BaseBoundary class extends the Base class and provides the basic input functionalities and access to all the boundary classes.
    class 
    CoordinatorBoundary
    CoordinatorBoundary is the Boundary layer for coordinators of the FYP in the system that interfaces with the Coordinator system actor and issue commands to other boundary and/or controller objects for execution of commands.
    class 
    ProjectBoundary
    This Project Boundary is responsible for retrieving inputs and displaying outputs from its project controller.
    class 
    RequestBoundary
    Request's application interface used by Student, Supervisor and Cooordinator to process and update requests.
    class 
    StudentBoundary
    Student's application interface after logging in.
    class 
    SupervisorBoundary
    The SupervisorBoundary class is responsible for handling interactions between the supervisor interface and the SupervisorController.
    class 
    UserBoundary
    This class represents the UserBoundary that handles the login screen and directs users to their respective screens.

  • Uses of Base in controller

    Subclasses of Base in controller
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    class 
    BaseController
    The BaseController class is the base class for all controllers in the system.
    class 
    CoordinatorController
    A class that serves as a Controller for the CoordinatorBoundary class.
    class 
    ProjectController
    The ProjectController class manages the creation, modification, and retrieval of Project objects, as well as the assignment of projects to students and supervisors.
    class 
    RequestController
    A class that serves as a controller for managing requests.
    class 
    StudentController
    Student's controller to process inputs obtained from the Student's Boundary.
    class 
    SupervisorController
    The SupervisorController class is a subclass of UserController that handles supervisor-specific functionalities.
    class 
    UserController
    The UserController class is responsible for managing the logic of all users in the system and handling user-related functionality.
